  • java.lang.Object
    • vista.report.AppUtils

  • public class AppUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    contains the common utility functions

    • Method Detail

      • getDataReference

        public static vista.set.DataReference getDataReference(vista.set.Group dssGroup,
                                                       java.lang.String bpart,
                                                       java.lang.String cpart,
                                                       vista.time.TimeWindow tw)
        returns a data reference which exists in a dss file/group with an exact b part "bpart" and and exact c part "cpart" and a time window. If no data reference is found a null is returned. Pre-conditions: 1. If either part is null only one part is matched and the first reference matching is returned. 2. If both parts are null then null is returned. 3. If time window is greater then existing time window a reference with intersecting time window is returned. If no reference is 4. If time window is null the default time window in the group is returned Post-conditions: 1. If more than one data reference is matched then a warning message is printed to the output and the first matching is returned. 2. If an error occurs or if the inputs are not valid or if nothing is found for the given inputs a null reference is returned.

      • getDataReferences

        public static vista.set.DataReference[] getDataReferences(java.lang.String[] parts,
                                                          java.lang.String fileType)
        gets the pathnames for the matching parts array and fileType If any part is null it is ignored for a match. This method
        Parameters:
        parts - The pathname part from A to F
        fileType - AppUtils.SVAR or AppUtils.DVAR
        Returns:
        an array of data references or null if no file found

      • getOperationId

        public static int getOperationId(java.lang.String operationStr)
        gets the operation id which is one of the id's defined in TimeSeriesMath class
        Parameters:
        operationStr - is one of +,-,*,/
        Returns:
        the operation id or -1 if none is found
        See Also:
        TimeSeriesMath

      • getOperationName

        public static java.lang.String getOperationName(int operationId)
        gets the operation name for the given operation id
        Parameters:
        operation - id one of TimeSeriesMath.ADD|SUB|MUL|DIV
        See Also:
        TimeSeriesMath

      • guessTimeWindowFromGroup

        public static vista.time.TimeWindow guessTimeWindowFromGroup(vista.set.Group g)
        This method attempts the guess the time window from the given group by filtering for "FLOW" and then reading upto five pathnames and taking their intersection

      • guessListOfBparts

        public static java.lang.String[] guessListOfBparts(vista.set.Group g)
        guesses a unique list of b parts from given group
        Returns:
        a unique list of b parts or a list of exactly one empty string if none found

      • guessListOfCparts

        public static java.lang.String[] guessListOfCparts(vista.set.Group g)
        guesses a unique list of c parts from a given group
        Returns:
        a unique list of c parts or a list of exactly one empty string if none found

      • getDataReference

        public static vista.set.DataReference getDataReference(int studyNumber,
                                                       java.lang.String bpart,
                                                       java.lang.String cpart)
        This method queries for a pathname with the given bpart and cpart in the varType Group.
        Parameters:
        varType - The type of the variable SVAR or DVAR
        studyNumber - The study #1 or #2
        bpart - The b part
        cpart - The c part
